subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Steve Flesch, seeking his second victory in two months, shot a six-under-par 66 yesterday to take a four-shot lead over Carl Pettersson and Charles Warren after three rounds at the inaugural Turning Stone Resort Championship in Verona, N.Y.
snippet: Steve Flesch, seeking his second victory in two months, shot a six-under-par 66 yesterday to take a four-shot lead over Carl Pettersson and Charles Warren after three rounds at the inaugural Turning Stone Resort Championship in Verona, N.Y.
